definition: lit. a donkey's lips do not match a horse's mouth (idiom)/fig. beside the point/incongruous
pinyin: lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: variant of 驢|驴[lu:2]
donkey/CL:頭|头[tou2]
variant of 唇[chun2]
lip
(negative prefix)/not/no
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
mouth/beak/nozzle/spout (of teapot etc)/CL:張|张[zhang1],個|个[ge4]

sentences.chinese: 这个比方有点驴唇不对马嘴。

sentences.english: It seemed such an insane answer to give.
sentences.chinese: 这种回答听起来简直驴唇不对马嘴。

definition: see 驢唇不對馬嘴|驴唇不对马嘴[lu:2 chun2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3]
pinyin: niu2 tou2 bu4 dui4 ma3 zui3

definition: irrelevant/beside the point
to not know what sb is driving at/to be unintelligible
incoherent (writing or speech)/nonsensical/a load of crap
confused/disorderly/incoherent
lit. chicken speaking with duck/fig. talking without communicating/people not understanding each other
to be completely unrelated to one another (idiom)/irrelevant
pinyin: feng1 ma3 niu2 bu4 xiang1 ji2

definition: to talk about this and that (idiom); to ramble incoherently
a bunch of nonsense/verbose and rambling
to talk random nonsense (idiom); to say whatever comes into one's head
(idiom) to sidestep the question/to answer evasively
lit. to play the lute to a cow (idiom)/fig. offering a treat to an unappreciative audience/to cast pearls before swine/caviar to the general/to preach to deaf ears/to talk over sb's head
not to the point/wide of the mark/neither here nor there/irrelevant
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
to talk nonsense (idiom)/frivolous talk
to not fully understand (idiom)
